chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aemi: applied_entries_monotonic_interface
smci: state_machine_correct_interface
si: sorted_interface
lacimi: lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface
lmi: log_matching_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
out: output

Goal:
forall (h : name) (ps : list packet) (sigma : Net.name -> data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := sigma |} -> doGenericServer h (sigma h) = (os, st', ms) -> in_output_list client id out os -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st'))

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
in_output_list = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (os : list raft_output) => In (ClientResponse client id o) os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list raft_output -> Prop Arguments in_output_list {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (sigma : name -> raft_data) => match argmax (fun h : name => lastApplied (sigma h)) (all_fin N) with | Some h => rev (removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h))) | None => [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (name -> raft_data) -> list entry Arguments applied_entries {orig_base_params raft_params} _%function_scope
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <?
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput :
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments Append
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params aemi : applied_entries_monotonic_interface smci : state_machine_correct_interface si : sorted_interface lacimi : lastApplied_commitIndex_match_interface lmi : log_matching_interface client : clientId id : nat out : output |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
output_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (aes : list entry) => exists (xs : list entry) (e : entry) (ys : list entry) (tr' : list (input * output)) (st' : data), deduplicate_log aes = xs ++ e :: ys /\ eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ execute_log (xs ++ [e]) = (tr', st') /\ hd_error (rev tr') =
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
doLeader_appliedEntries : forall (sigma : name -> raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader (sigma h) h = (os, st', ms) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st') = applied_entries sigma
handleInput_in_output_list : forall (h : name) (i : raft_input) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleInput h i st = (os, st', ms) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
doLeader_key_in_output_list : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', m) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
handleInput_key_in_output_list : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (i : raft_input) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)), handleInput h i st = (os, st', m) -> ~ in_output_list client id out os
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), doGenericServer h d = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleClientRequest_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
doGenericServer_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (out, st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft...
applied_entries_log_lastApplied_update_same : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), log st = log (sigma h) -> lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
applied_entries_safe_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied (sigma h)) = removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h)) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
applied_entries_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st >= lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma /\ (exists h' : name, argmax (fun h0 : name => lastApplied (sigma h0)) (all_fin N) = Some h' /\ lastApplied (sigma h') >= lastApplied st) \/ argmax (fun h' : name => lastApplied (update name_eq_dec sigma h st h')) (all_fin N) = Some h /\ applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h...
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
doLeader_same_log : forall (st : raft_data) (n : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st n = (os, st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleClientRequest_commitIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
in_output_list_split : forall l l' : list raft_output, in_output_list client id out (l ++ l') -> in_output_list client id out l \/ in_output_list client id out l'
Build_output_correct_interface : (forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net))) -> output_correct_interface
applied_entries_log_lastApplied_same : forall sigma sigma' : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output, (forall h : name, log (sigma' h) = log (sigma h)) -> (forall h : name, lastApplied (sigma' h) = lastApplied (sigma h)) -> applied_entries sigma' = applied_entries sigma
in_output_list_cons_or : forall (a : clientId) (b : nat) (c : output) (l : list raft_output), in_output_list client id out (ClientResponse a b c :: l) -> a = client /\ b = id /\ c = out \/ in_output_list client id out l
handleClientRequest_logs_sorted : forall (h : name) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (net : network), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, st, l) -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted_host net -> sorted (log st)
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Record output_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_correct_interface { output_correct_invariant : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (out : output) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> in_output_trace client id out tr -> output_correct client id out (applied_entries (nwState net)) } Arguments output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
